confirmations.confirmWithPayment:
‚ö†Ô∏è CONFIRM BOOKING

Customer: {{customerName}}
Amount: {{amount}} XPF

‚úÖ This action will:
‚Ä¢ Capture the authorized payment ({{amount}} XPF)
‚Ä¢ Confirm the booking for the customer
‚Ä¢ Lock in your commission rate
‚Ä¢ Send confirmation notification to customer

‚ùå This action CANNOT be undone!

Proceed with booking confirmation?
confirmations.confirmWithoutPayment:
‚ö†Ô∏è CONFIRM BOOKING

Customer: {{customerName}}

‚Ä¢ Confirm the booking for the customer

confirmations.declineWithPayment:
‚ö†Ô∏è DECLINE BOOKING

Customer: {{customerName}}
Refund Amount: {{amount}} XPF

‚úÖ This action will:
‚Ä¢ Automatically refund {{amount}} XPF to customer
‚Ä¢ Decline the booking permanently
‚Ä¢ Free up tour capacity
‚Ä¢ Notify customer of cancellation

‚ùå This action CANNOT be undone!

Proceed with booking decline and refund?

‚ö†Ô∏è DECLINE BOOKING

Proceed with booking decline?
confirmations.complete:

Customer: {{customerName}}
Tour: {{tourName}}

errors.INVALID_RECURRENCE_TYPE: Recurrence type must be once, daily, weekly, or monthly
errors.DAYS_OF_WEEK_MUST_BE_ARRAY: Days of week must be an array
errors.INVALID_DAYS_OF_WEEK: Days of week must be integers between 1 (Monday) and 7 (Sunday)
errors.WEEKLY_REQUIRES_DAYS: Weekly recurrence requires at least one day of week to be specified
errors.INVALID_TIME_FORMAT: Start time must be in HH:MM format (e.g., 09:30)
errors.INVALID_START_DATE_FORMAT: Start date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
errors.INVALID_END_DATE_FORMAT: End date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
errors.START_DATE_IN_PAST: Start date cannot be in the past
errors.END_DATE_BEFORE_START: End date must be after start date
errors.EXCEPTIONS_MUST_BE_ARRAY: Exceptions must be an array of dates
errors.INVALID_EXCEPTION_DATES: All exception dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
errors.INVALID_TOUR_ID_FORMAT: Tour ID must be a valid UUID
errors.INVALID_OPERATOR_ID_FORMAT: Operator ID must be a valid UUID

hero.title: Last-Minute Offers „Éª Free Booking Platform
hero.subtitle: The One Platform Every French Polynesian Operator Needs

revenue.title: Revenue Recovery
revenue.description: Stop losing money to last-minute cancellations. VAI instantly connects you with tourists ready to fill cancelled spots.

instant.title: Instant Discovery
instant.description: Tourists are looking for authentic experiences in French Polynesia RIGHT NOW. Get found instantly when they're ready to book.

mood.title: Mood-Based Matching
mood.description: Revolutionary: Tourists tell us their mood (Adventure, Relax, Culture, Ocean) and we show them YOUR activity!

commission.title: Industry-Leading Low Commission
commission.description: Keep 89% of your revenue with our transparent 11% commission structure

noSetup.title: No Complex Setup Required
noSetup.description: Keep your existing payment methods. Post availability when you have it

liveChat.title: Live Chat Integration
liveChat.description: Direct communication with tourists through our built-in chat system

realTime.title: Real-Time Notifications
realTime.description: Instant alerts for new bookings, confirmations, and customer messages

dualPreview.title: Two Powerful Platforms. One Seamless Experience.
dualPreview.description: Beautiful mood-based discovery meets professional operator management

activityTypes.title: All Activities Welcome
activityTypes.wrapper: Every activity type has its perfect audience
activityTypes.subtitle: From ocean adventures to cultural workshops - every experience finds its audience

operatorPreview.title: See Your Professional Dashboard
operatorPreview.subtitle: Track revenue, manage bookings, communicate with customers
operatorPreview.features: Real-time analytics ‚Ä¢ Automated confirmations ‚Ä¢ Direct customer chat ‚Ä¢ Multi-language support

professional.title: Professional Dashboard
professional.description: Revenue tracking, booking management, and automated confirmations - free access for all operators. No setup fee
professional.benefit: Full business control at your fingertips

experience.title: Beautiful Customer Experience
experience.description: Your activities reach customers through intelligent mood and weather matching across all device types

inclusive.title: All Activities Welcome
inclusive.description: From ocean adventures to cultural workshops - every experience finds its perfect audience through our platform
inclusive.benefit: No matter what you offer, we connect you with the right customers

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Interface
multiLanguage.description: French, English, Tahitian, Spanish, Italian, German support for global reach

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: Built-in 2025 whale watching regulations and safety standard management

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
